name: METAVERSE LANDÂ INVESTMENT TRUST NO.1(MLIT1)
description:
MLIT is a metaverse land investment trust operated by MAITs, which aims to create a more equitable metaverse ecosystem.
MLIT will acquire and manage a portfolio of diversified metaverse real estate properties and assets, the profits of which will be 98% directed back to the token; 2% for the management fee. This includes but is not limited to buying, developing, renting, and financing income-generating metaverse land. 
Being one of the frontiers in this field, enough funding can make MLIT operate as a leading organization in the metaverse real estate market
This project is not a meme nor is it a scam. Visit our website for more information
